LanguageData.MutationAffinity.degreeDatas.0.label: mutation affinity
LanguageData.MutationAffinity.degreeDatas.0.descripti: {PAWN_nameDef} is intrigued by the idea of becoming something other than human.
LanguageData.PM_PridefulTrait.degreeDatas.0.label: prideful
LanguageData.PM_PridefulTrait.degreeDatas.0.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef]'s sees [PAWN_objective]self as the natural leader of [PAWN_possessive] pride and as a consequence looks down on others and is easily offended.
